tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE temperature_reading (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  reading_value DECIMAL,
  reading_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES temperature_sensor(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE composting_process (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name TEXT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  completed BOOLEAN,
  site_id INT,
  temperature_sensor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES composting_site(site_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (temperature_sensor_id) REFERENCES temperature_sensor(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Temperature_Readings (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Composting_Bins (
  bin_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature_threshold FLOAT,
  current_temperature FLOAT,
  active BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Bin_Log (
  log_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  bin_id INTEGER,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  activity VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Temperature_Alerts (
  alert_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  bin_id INTEGER,
  time_sent TIMESTAMP,
  message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Sensor_Locations (
  sensor_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
)
